hero.title:
Reliability
Quality
International Experience
hero.subtitle: We produce yarn for the future with care for every thread.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Siyob Group Textile is a dynamically developing textile company from Samarkand, specializing in cotton yarn production. We unite three modern factories that work in a unified system and allow us to produce goods in demand both in domestic and international markets.
about.description2: Each of our factories is equipped with equipment from leading world manufacturers, ensuring stable quality and product compliance with international standards. We produce a wide range of cotton yarns for different segments of the textile industry - from knitwear to premium fabrics. We believe that success is built on a combination of three factors: quality raw materials, modern technology and a professional approach.

whyUs.title: Why Us
whyUs.mainText:
High quality textile products by international standards.
Siyob Group Textile uses modern production technology and strict quality
control, which allows customers to receive products that meet world requirements.
whyUs.quality: Quality - only verified raw materials and strict control at all stages.
whyUs.reliability: Reliability - long-term partnerships and compliance with delivery dates.
whyUs.openness: Openness - honest terms and transparent cooperation with clients and partners.
whyUs.delivery: Reliable delivery times - built logistics and experienced management guarantee timely product delivery.
whyUs.international: International trust - Siyob Group Textile cooperates with foreign partners and has proven itself as a stable and reliable manufacturer.

productions.title: Our Productions
productions.surxonDesc: Specializes in KCD and KCM yarn.
productions.maroqandDesc: Produces a wide range: Carded Ring Spun, Open End, Slub yarn, Lycra and Dual Core
productions.kamalakDesc: Focuses on KCD and KW yarn.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: Need solutions for your textile production?

geography.title: Geography
geography.text: Siyob Group Textile products are successfully supplied to the domestic market and exported to more than 10 countries, including: China, India, Pakistan, Iran, Egypt, Turkey and European countries. This confirms the high competitiveness and trust of international partners in our brand.
